description: Trump’s vice president pick Vance is skeptical about U.S. support for Ukraine, wants NATO members to pay more in aid, and advocates concessions to Russia.
title: What JD Vance has said about the war in Ukraine

description: As Israel’s military continues to bombard central Gaza, the Red Cross is warning that its field hospital in Rafah is at a breaking point following a surge in casualties from recent Israeli attacks. NBC News’ Hala Gorani reports on the latest warnings from the ICRC.
title: Red Cross warns Gazan field hospital is at a breaking point following Israeli attacks

description: Lionel Messi faced calls to apologize for racist chants about French players with African heritage made by Argentina’s players after their Copa America win.
title: Lionel Messi asked to apologize for Argentina players' racist chant

description: Thousands of fish have died along a main river in Sao Paulo after an alleged illegal dumping of industrial waste from a sugar and ethanol plant. According to local media, this is the second time the river has been covered in dead fish in the last month, when thousands of fish died at the same location.
title: Dead fish cover a Brazilian river after the alleged dumping of industrial waste

description: Inside the northern Gaza refugee camp in Jabalia, an NBC News’ crew found Palestinians standing in long lines, desperate for fresh supplies of drinking water.
title: Severe shortage of drinking water in Gaza poses huge risks to health

description: Wall Street Journal journalist Evan Gershkovich, charged by Russia with spying on behalf of the CIA, appeared at a closed hearing as part of his trial in Yekaterinburg. Gershkovich, the WSJ and CIA all deny the accusations. NBC News' Daniele Hamamdjian has the latest on Early Today.
title: Evan Gershkovich appears in Russian court again as espionage trial continues

description: Several tons of fish have died along one of the main rivers in Brazil’s Sao Paulo state after the alleged illegal dumping of industrial waste.
title: Tons of dead fish fill river in Brazil after waste dumping allegations

description: A fire at a shopping mall killed 16 people in China's Sichuan province, state media reported. Firefighters in the city of Zigong rescued 75 people from the 14-story commercial building, which houses a movie theater and a department store, Chinese media reported.
title: Eyewitness video shows deadly fire raging at shopping mall in southwest China
